item.description:
This is a group for everyone interested in dreams. Whether your dreams be night-dreams, day-dreams, visions, trances, meditations, guided meditations, shamanic journeys, hypnotic states, spiritual experiences, or other altered states of consciousness.
Meet other dreamers. Share your dream experiences with others. Tap into your creativity. Learn how to remember your dreams. Be aware when you are dreaming. Control your dreams. Use your dreams to heal and manifest your desires. Learn what your dreams mean. Learn about dream telepathy and astral travel. Explore other worlds. Explore your own sub-conscious and super-conscious. Get in touch with your inner wisdom. Understand the meaning and purpose of your life journey.
Boston Dreamers is a participatory Meetup group. We want to know what dream-related subjects you would like to see covered. If you have a particular expertise related to dreams or if you have a particular burning passion to lead or co-lead a dream-related Meetup event please contact us. We are actively seeking topic suggestions, speakers, and presenters.
item.name: Boston Dreamers Meetup Group
